title: Couple With Heart Man Man Medium Light Skin Tone Dark Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Two Men Holding Hands With Heart
description: Represents a romantic relationship between two men, with one having a medium-light skin tone and the other a dark skin tone, symbolizing love and partnership.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'Couple with Heart (Man, Man)' emoji beautifully captures a loving connection between two men, with one rendered in a medium-light skin tone and the other in a dark skin tone. Apple's distinctive 3D rendering imbues the figures with gentle curves and a soft, warm glow, emphasizing their shared affection. The prominent heart, glowing with a subtle inner light, symbolizes romance, partnership, and deep emotional bonds, all presented with Apple's characteristic polished aesthetic.
